cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.PhotoController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPhotoController

    public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhotoController
    Controller interface for Photo management, such as adding/deleting tags, get photos by date range/tag.
    Author:
    dheeptha

      PhotoController()
      Instantiates a new photo controller.
